CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: For PDTP - DTBT and PDTP-DT2BT , the blend film of polymer / PC 70 BM spin - coated from CB was also rough , but the blend films fabricated from DCB displayed a much smoother surface with a RMS of 0.188 nm and 0.259 nm , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PDTP-DTBT    |
| PDTP-DT2BT   |
| polymer      |
| PC 70 BM      |
| CB           |
| DCB          |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PDTP-DTBT    |
| PDTP-DT2BT   |
| polymer      |
| PC 70 BM      |
| DCB          |

Explanation:

* PDTP-DTBT, PDTP-DT2BT are clearly material names mentioned in the paragraph.
* Polymer, PC 70 BM, and DCB are also material names as they are mentioned as the materials from which the blend films are fabricated.

Paragraph: For PDTP - DTBT and PDTP-DT2BT , the blend film of polymer / PC 70 BM spin - coated from CB was also rough , but the blend films fabricated from DCB displayed a much smoother surface with a RMS of 0.188 nm and 0.259 nm , respectively.
